title: Stuck By The Demoness’S Side
alternative_title: Only I Am a Closed Beta Player, Doomsday Invincible: Only I Am a Closed Beta Player, Resurgence of The Solo Beta Player, 末世无敌：只有我是内测玩家, Invincible in the apocalypse: I’m the only beta player
status: Only I Am a Closed Beta Player, Doomsday Invincible: Only I Am a Closed Beta Player, Resurgence of The Solo Beta Player, 末世无敌：只有我是内测玩家, Invincible in the apocalypse: I’m the only beta player
description:
Description :
        Jiang Hao isekai-ed into an ordinary peasant's family, and was sold into the Demonic Sect and forced to become a disciple. He wanted to cultivate in peace and build his strength steadily, in order to survive in this Cultivation-based world. But, he instead was humiliated in every possible manner by a Demoness. The difference in their strength was overwhelming, and so he could only endure the humiliation in order to preserve his life. Without the help of a backer, Jiang Hao gained the favor of the Demonic Sect and was finally able to cultivate in peace. When he became the chief disciple and met with the Sect leader however, he looked at the other party's supremely beautiful face and didn't know whether to laugh or to cryStuck by the Demoness's Side, Staying by the Side of the Devil, mangabuddy is a website dedicated to fans of anime, , , , video games, and cosplay.
